title: Schedule Preventive Maintenance for Wellhead
description: A maintenance planner schedules a preventive maintenance job for a critical wellhead based on runtime hours and manufacturer recommendations.

tasks.description: Check the maintenance history and total operating hours for wellhead WH-101.
tasks.expected_outcome: The asset's full maintenance history and runtime are retrieved.

tasks.description: Based on the data, determine the required maintenance tasks and create a work order in the CMMS.
tasks.expected_outcome: A detailed work order is created with all necessary tasks listed.

tasks.description: Assign the work order to a qualified technician team and schedule it for next week.
tasks.expected_outcome: The work order is scheduled and assigned in the system.
